name: rally speaker
description:
Product Features:
• Clear and rich sound with Logitech RightSound™ technologies
• Patent-pending suspension system eliminates vibration-induced camera shake and audio interference
• Mini XLR cable connects to Rally Display Hub for both signal and power
• Available accessories: Rally Mounting Kit includes two wall-mount brackets for Rally Speaker, plus cable retainers (x2) and mounting brackets for camera and hubs (x2)

Product Specifications:
• External Dimension: 103 x 449 x 80mm
• High-performance 76 mm driver with rare-earth magnet
• Speaker volume 95 dB SPL @1 W, 100 dB SPL @7.5 W, both +/-2 dB at ½ meter
• Distortion: 200 Hz–300 Hz <2.5%, 300 Hz–10 kHz < 1%@7.5 W
• Speaker Sampling Rate: 48KHz

Package Contents:
• Rally Speaker with 2.95 m Mini XLR cable (supports customer-supplied extension cables up to 3 m) x1
• Documentation
